%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://b.alicdn.com/s/polyfill.min.js?features=default,es2015,es2016,es2017,fetch,IntersectionObserver,NodeList.prototype.forEach,NodeList.prototype.@@iterator,EventSource,MutationObserver,ResizeObserver,HTMLCanvasElement.prototype.toBlob"></script>

      window.routerBase = '/';
      window.resourceBaseUrl = 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/os/chair-script/skylark/';

rl%3A%20zghdqa%5Cn%20%20id%3A%203301400%5Cn-%20type%3A%20DOC%5Cn%20%20title%3A%202019%E7%AC%AC46%E5%91%A8(11%2F11%20-%2011%2F16)%5Cn%20%20level%3A%200%5Cn%20%20url%3A%20gmnoh7%5Cn%20%20id%3A%203206625%5Cn-%20type%3A%20DOC%5Cn%20%20title%3A%202019%E7%AC%AC45%E5%91%A8(11%2F04%20-%2011%2F09)%5Cn%20%20level%3A%200%5Cn%20%20url%3A%20dadsrw%5Cn%20%20id%3A%203135858%5Cn-%20type%3A%20DOC%5Cn%20%20title%3A%202019%E7%AC%AC44%E5%91%A8(10%2F28%20-%2011%2F02)%5Cn%20%20level%3A%200%5Cn%20%20url%3A%20kyfysa%5Cn%20%20id%3A%203046043%5Cn-%20type%3A%20DOC%5Cn%20%20title%3A%20%E5%89%8D%E7%AB%AF%E5%91%A8%E6%8A%A5%E8%A7%84%E8%8C%83%5Cn%20%20level%3A%200%5Cn%20%20url%3A%20go8yzi%5Cn%20%20id%3A%201141216%5Cn%22%2C%22body%22%3Anull%2C%22user_id%22%3A319471%2C%22creator_id%22%3A84824%2C%22public%22%3A0%2C%22status%22%3A0%2C%22excellent%22%3A0%2C%22menu_type%22%3A0%2C%22items_count%22%3A24%2C%22likes_count%22%3A0%2C%22watches_count%22%3A2%2C%22content_updated_at_ms%22%3A1580560842626%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222018-11-10T02%3A53%3A28.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T12%3A40%3A42.000Z%22%2C%22pinned_at%22%3Anull%2C%22archived_at%22%3Anull%2C%22collaboration_count%22%3A0%2C%22stack_id%22%3A25088%2C%22rank%22%3A14%2C%22resource_size%22%3A0%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22create%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_doc%22%3Atrue%2C%22update_toc%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22read_private%22%3Atrue%2C%22export%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22join%22%3Atrue%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%2C%22modify_setting%22%3Afalse%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22toc_version%22%3A10401444%7D%2C%22doc%22%3A%7B%22content_updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T12%3A40%3A42.000Z%22%2C%22body%22%3A%22%22%2C%22body_asl%22%3A%22%22%2C%22body_draft%22%3A%22%22%2C%22body_draft_asl%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSuspect%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A4291034%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22slu %7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://b.alicdn.com/s/polyfill.min.js?features=default,es2015,es2016,es2017,fetch,IntersectionObserver,NodeList.prototype.forEach,NodeList.prototype.@@iterator,EventSource,MutationObserver,ResizeObserver,HTMLCanvasElement.prototype.toBlob"></script>

6134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

<script>

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');

%7D%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%2C%22abilities%22%3A%7B%22destroy%22%3Atrue%2C%22read%22%3Atrue%2C%22update%22%3Atrue%2C%22create_collaborator%22%3Atrue%2C%22manage%22%3Afalse%2C%22share%22%3Atrue%7D%2C%22image%22%3A%22%22%2C%22ogpTitle%22%3A%222020%20%E7%AC%AC%2003%20%E6%9C%9F%20(01%2F26%20-%2002%2F01)%20%C2%B7%20%E8%AF%AD%E9%9B%80%22%2C%22body_html%22%3A%22%22%2C%22joinToken%22%3A%7B%22id%22%3A2660179%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22target_type%22%3A%22Doc%22%2C%22target_id%22%3A4291034%2C%22creator_id%22%3A309892%2C%22token%22%3A%22eNelwHoeyJSBPerP%22%2C%22approve%22%3A1%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222020-02-01T07%3A17%3A51.000Z%22%2C%22creator%22%3A%7B%22work_id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22small_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_80%2Ch_80%22%2C%22medium_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_160%2Ch_160%22%2C%22large_avatar_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%3Fx-oss-process%3Dimage%2Fresize%2Cm_fill%2Cw_320%2Ch_320%22%2C%22isActive%22%3Atrue%2C%22isDeactived%22%3Afalse%2C%22isBanned%22%3Afalse%2C%22isExtcontact%22%3Afalse%2C%22isPaid%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasPaidBefore%22%3Afalse%2C%22id%22%3A309892%2C%22space_id%22%3A0%2C%22type%22%3A%22User%22%2C%22login%22%3A%22lmio2333%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22%E5%A7%9A%E9%BA%9F%22%2C%22description%22%3Anull%2C%22avatar%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.nlark.com%2Fyuque%2F0%2F2019%2Fpng%2F309892%2F1574496134603-avatar%2F621e2891-849c-408e-ab80-65985c717abc.png%22%2C%22owner_id%22%3Anull%2C%22topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22public_topics_count%22%3A0%2C%22members_count%22%3A0%2C%22books_count%22%3A1%2C%22public_books_count%22%3A0%2C%22followers_count%22%3A0%2C%22following_count%22%3A0%2C%22account_id%22%3A164783%2C%22role%22%3A1%2C%22status%22%3A1%2C%22public%22%3A1%2C%22wants_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22wants_marketing_email%22%3Atrue%2C%22topic_updated_at_ms%22%3A0%2C%22deleted_slug%22%3Anull%2C%22language%22%3A%22zh-cn%22%2C%22organization_id%22%3A0%2C%22emp_type%22%3Anull%2C%22group_department_updated_at%22%3Anull%2C%22member_level%22%3Anull%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22scene%22%3Anull%2C%22source%22%3Anull%2C%22max_member%22%3Anull%2C%22created_at%22%3A%222019-04-08T02%3A00%3A19.000Z%22%2C%22updated_at%22%3A%222019-11-23T08%3A02%3A21.000Z%22%2C%22deleted_at%22%3Anull%7D%7D%2C%22fileExtensions%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%22isDocCollaborator%22%3Afalse%2C%22isCollaborationPage%22%3Afalse%2C%22docUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yuque.com%2Fxsued%2Freport%2Fra4w6u%22%2C%22paymentInfo%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22enable_payment%22%3Afalse%2C%22userMemberInfo%22%3A%7B%22usage%22%3A%7B%22attachment_size%22%3A0%2C%22image_size%22%3A228738%2C%22video_size%22%3A0%2C%22max_upload_size%22%3A10737418240%2C%22_serializer%22%3A%22web.user_usage%22%7D%2C%22expired_at%22%3Anull%2C%22countDownDays%22%3Anull%2C%22isAllowRenew%22%3Afalse%2C%22receipt%22%3Anull%2C%22groupOwners%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22hasOrder%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22login%22%3A%7B%22loginType%22%3A%22normal%22%2C%22enablePlatforms%22%3A%5B%22dingtalk%22%2C%22alipay%22%2C%22wechat%22%2C%22teambition%22%5D%2C%22isWechatMobileApp%22%3Afalse%7D%2C%22isDingTalkMiniApp%22%3Afalse%7D"));
})();
</script>

    <div id="ReactApp"></div>
    <script>
      var MaxErrorReportLimit = 100;
      // 简单的将错误采集上报到 /api/logs/error
      window.onerror = function(message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
        // 同一个页面最多上报100次错误，防止某个循环错误页面一直打开，不断的报错
        if (MaxErrorReportLimit-- < 0) return;
        try {
          var msg = {
            message: message,
            source: source,
            lineno: lineno,
            colno: colno,
            stack: error && error.stack,
            traceId: window.appData && window.appData.traceId,
            href: window.location.href,
          };
          msg = JSON.stringify(msg);
          // 用于 macaca E2E 自动化测试
          window.__macaca_latest_error = msg;
          var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
          req.open('post', '/api/logs/error', true);
          req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
          req.send(msg);

          // clue 记录错误堆栈
          if (window.tracker) {
            tracker.logError(error, {
              code: 1,
              msg: message,
            });
          }
        } catch (err) {
          console.log('report error', err);
        }
      };

      // 监听 window.onload 是否执行，用于组件中执行 onload 后续事件
      window.addEventListener('load', function() {
        try {
          // 移动端开启
          var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/iphone|ipad|android|micromessenger/i);
          if (isMobile) {
            var rootNode = document.querySelector('#ReactApp');
            if (rootNode && !rootNode.innerHTML) {
              // ready 3s 后节点内容为空，展示友好报错
              setTimeout(function() {
                // 插入节点前再次检查是否白屏
                if (!rootNode.innerHTML) {
                  var html = '<div>';
                  html += '<h3 style="margin-top: 45%;text-align: center;">页面打不开？快来找开发 GG 帮忙</h3>';
                  if (window.appData && window.appData.traceId) {
                    html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">反馈信息: ' + window.appData.traceId + '</p>';
                  }
                  html += '<p style="padding: 10px 30px;">截图或复制反馈信息到: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics/new">https://www.yuque.com/yuque/topics</a></p>'
                  html += '</div>';
                  rootNode.innerHTML = html;
                }
              }, 3000);
            }
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
        if (window.appData) {
          window.appData.windowOnLoaded = true;
        }
      }, false);
    </script>
    <script crossorigin src="https://g.alicdn.com/dt/tracker/4.0.6/tracker.Tracker.js"></script>
    <script>
      // 异常上报 clue，查看统计数据
      if (window.appData && window.appData.env === 'prod') {
        try {
          var tracker = new window.Tracker({
            pid: window.appData.isYuque ? 'yuque' : 'skylark',
            uidResolver: function() {
              return window.appData.me.login;
            },
            beforeLog: function(logItem) {
              if (
                logItem.msg.indexOf('Failed to fetch') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('已取消') > -1 ||
                logItem.msg.indexOf('cancelled') > -1
              ) {
                return false;
              }
              return true;
            },
            ignoreScriptError: true // 第三方造成的 script error 将被忽略
          });
          // 监听 window.onerror 事件并打点
          tracker.onGlobalError();
          window.tracker = tracker;
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(`default.html tracker 初始化失败：${e.message}`);
        }
      }
    </script>

      !function(t,e,a,r,c){t.TracertCmdCache=t.TracertCmdCache||[],t[c]=window[c]||
        {_isRenderInit:!0,call:function(){t.TracertCmdCache.push(arguments)},
          start:function(t){this.call('start',t)}},t[c].l=new Date;
        var n=e.createElement(a),s=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0];
        n.async=!0,n.src=r,s.parentNode.insertBefore(n,s)}
      (window,document,'script','https://ur.alipay.com/tracert_a385.js','Tracert');
